Key Match Events: The Grizzlies suffered one of their worst defeats of the season in Sunday’s 130-106 loss to the Thunder.
Memphis gave up a season-high 33 points off turnovers against the Thunder.
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins acknowledged the impact of injuries and turnovers on the team's performance against the Thunder.
Jaren Jackson Jr. emphasized the need to improve ball movement and shooting to overcome turnover issues.
